episodes.synopsis: Man of the House showcases the evolution of men from the kings of their castles in classic family sitcoms to more intricate figures in modern shows.
episodes.title: Man of the House

episodes.synopsis: Far removed from the model housewife of yesterday, women today on TV care less about pleasing others and more about being true to themselves.
episodes.title: Independent Woman

episodes.synopsis: Whether they are oddballs, losers or just plain weird, misfit characters have grown beyond comic stereotypes and take center stage with a vengeance.
episodes.title: The Misfit

episodes.synopsis: The Crusader delves into the grey area between right and wrong as TV heroes confront internal demons while seeking their own forms of justice.
episodes.title: The Crusader

video.title: America in Primetime
video.synopsis: Discover the creative forces behind television's modern golden age as writers, producers and performers discuss key elements of acclaimed TV shows.
